Research.Title: RecovR, Post-Surgery Recovery Monitoring Platform
Research.Description: Created an iOS and web application that combines patient recovery journals with data from wearable sensors. This project involved addressing the difficulties of analyzing fragmented and noisy post-discharge recovery signals to support informed clinical decision-making.

Research.Title: BookTrack Library, Software Systems Academic Project
Research.Description: Developed a library platform using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, focusing on integrating AI to enhance search capabilities and streamline maintenance processes. Investigated the impact of changing requirements on system behavior, highlighting the potential of AI to support more effective software comprehension and management.

Research.Title: The Melting Pot, A Social-media Cooking Platform
Research.Description: Created a recipe-sharing platform using React and MySQL with a focus on investigating how users‚Äô intentions and interactions with features change over time in socially-oriented applications.

Research.Title: Little Star Pediatric Care System
Research.Description: Developed an automated platform using JavaFX that integrates secure authentication, prescription handling, and RESTful data services. This project deepened my passion for intelligent healthcare solutions by allowing me to design comprehensive digital clinical workflows from start to finish.
